name: Inspiring Todo App
description: Get inspired to work when you open a new tab with beautiful imagery and a straightforward todo app.
author: Dan Pantinople

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; script-src-elem 'self' https://ida-todo-app.firebaseio.com  https://www.google-analytics.com https://www.googletagmanager.com
